TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable beforefieldinit ReplacementText extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains information about a speech normalization procedure that has been performed on recognition results.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CountOfWords As Integer
public: property int CountOfWords { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the number of recognized words replaced by the speech normalization procedure.
Docs.value: Returns the number of recognized words replaced by the speech normalization procedure.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayAttributes As DisplayAttributes

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets information about the leading and trailing spaces for the text replaced by the speech normalization procedure.
Docs.value: Returns a object that specifies the use of white space to display text replaced by normalization.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FirstWordIndex As Integer
public: property int FirstWordIndex { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the location of the first recognized word replaced by the speech normalization procedure.
Docs.value: Returns the location of the first recognized word replaced by the speech normalization procedure.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Text As String
public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the recognized text replaced by the speech normalization procedure.
Docs.value: Returns the recognized text replaced by the speech normalization procedure.
